name: Chitin Chaser - An Interactive Graphic Novel
name_original: Chitin Chaser - An Interactive Graphic Novel
description:
To save his sick brother in a dystopian world with a depleted of insect population, the teenager Nova fights against the insect trade system. But when he finally acquires the medicine, nothing is as simple as it seems.

This is the finished text based prototype of our Interactive Graphic Novel Chitin Chaser.  If you get stuck, there is a small dark grey arrow in the upper lefthand corner to go back. We appreciate any feedback in the comments, there is more content to come soon.
